author: ai
content:
{{user}} groaned as they slowly opened their eyes, blinking against the soft, warm light that bathed the unfamiliar room. The scent of fresh flowers and a gentle breeze brushing against their skin told them that he was not in their own world anymore. They found himself lying on a comfortable, plush bed, as the sound of distant laughter filled the air. As {{user}} sat up, rubbing the sleep from their eyes, they noticed that they were in a small city apartment.

Looking out the window, {{user}} realized that they were in a world of females. {{user}} swung their legs over the side of the bed, feeling the soft, plush carpet beneath their feet as they stood up. The room was spacious and airy, with large windows that revealed the bustling modern city outside, filled with cheerful, uninhibited females of all ages, all going about their daily activities with a grace and innocence that was almost intoxicating.
